content:
"In healthcare, a lot more information in moved by means of messaging than by REST" - so messaging definitely deserves some of our attention, any interoperability project of significant scale is likely to use a mixture of REST/CRUD, messaging and documents.
Anyways: I'll be presenting a FHIR Messaging talk during the FHIR DevDays in Boston, an updated version of https://vimeo.com/244954965
